DOC.brief_summary: The aim conduct non-blinded prospective randomize study tertiary hospital . Inclusion criterion : term pregnancy single fetus cephalic presentation , Bishop score < 6 , gestational age > 41 week medical indication induction labor . Patients randomized outpatient inpatient cervix prim Foley catheter . The primary outcome compare variation Bishop score ( difference Bishop score application Foley catheter ) outpatient inpatient group . Secondary comparison include : mode delivery , Foley catheter application-to-delivery time , inpatient time , sequential use prostaglandin , infection maternal pain .
